profile:
Vule Tile

Tile & Stone Contractors, ceramic marble, granite, porcelin, travertine, glass, slate, limestone, tile installation

If you can envision it, chances are you can create it with us. The options are almost limitless. Do you need both design flexibility and elegance? A material that's great for work or play? A surface that can stand up to the challenges of time and punishing customers or substances? We provide you with a wide selection of distributors and brand names from which to make your tile choices. We can help you get ideas by providing picture albums filled with pictures of projects that we have completed in virtually any kind of tile and/or marble applications. Are you looking for finishing touches like inlays and edge treatments? Or dramatic, thermoformed shapes that can engage, excite and express?
VULE TILE can provide a touch of durable and practical style to any room in your home or office. 

Check Us Out:
https://www.instagram.com/vuletile/
https://www.facebook.com/Vule-Tile-1743220772569825

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
We at Marvellous Contracting believe that our service, Quality and Craftsmanship is our number one priority in the services we have to offer! 
We are fully licensed and insured. We will not be satisfied until our customers are completely satisfied. 
We are focused on giving quality client care to every one of our customers. 

Our dedication is to work with every customer from the planning stage to the development stage to guarantee your necessities are met in a convenient way. 
All remodels will run into startling difficulties, and we will work with you to guarantee these are set out agreeable to you and, obviously, to code! 
Our responsibility likewise guarantees spotless and respectful staff, and a clean work territory, which is tidied up toward the finish of each workday.

Call us today and find out how we can help you with your upcoming project at an affordable cost!
905-367-6284

profile:
While located in Mississauga, Ontario Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. offers our renovation services all over the GTA even covering the Niagara region. We are a family run business, strongly committed to providing a high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation GHSL Inc. has built over the past 3 years in business.
 
While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owners of Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.
 
Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. licensed and for your protection we carry both liability and WSIB for all of our workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.
 
GHSL Inc. offers comprehensive remodeling services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want to remodel the kitchen or redo the bathroom, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.
